info.desc: This door in the Coffman Memorial Union basement leads to the East River Road Garage.
info.instr: Go to the basement floor of Coffman Memorial Union. There are elevators, stairs, and escalators.

info.desc: The East River Road Garage has stairs and elevators across these rows of parking. Notice the sign indicating the direction of the elevators.
info.instr: Follow the signs for the East River Road Garage by going south. At the base of the second set of escalators is a door to the garage.
